title: Sakanwa
author: Sakanwa
content: I have been really thinking of this for a long time now ever since when I started posting on the forum. I guess am not wrong to ask this question,*HOW CAN I SEND MERIT TO A QUALITY POST.I have seen alot of good post here and I wish to merit it but I don't know how it's been done,I just want to know how it's been done.

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Any post that you believe deserves merit - just click on the top left area - where you will see a tab …+ Merit Click on this and it will take you to a page where you can add a merit to the members post . SIMPLES  Hope this helps

comments.author: UchihaSarada
comments.body: Merit & new rank requirementsYou can send 1, 2, 3, 10 merit but can not send 0.5 merit. With 7 merit, you have 3.5 sendable merit but you can only send 3. For 0.5 sendable merit, you must have 1 more merit to gain 0.5 more sendable merit and have 1 sendable merit to send.Move it to Meta or Beginners & Help. Your topic is not about Bitcoin.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: I use your post as an example, but you can not merit your own post. Check the post of other people and click on 'merit', just as you see it in the image below:

comments.author: reagansimms
comments.body: After reading the replies to comments other users have left in this thread, you should try spending your first sMerit on a post you think is worthy of Merit. Currently there are around 3.5 sMerits that you can spend if you calculate each merit received will increase (0.5 sMerits).Please send merit on appropriate posts, not on posts you like. There are so many quality posts that have even previously been rewarded with merit by other users. If you think it's feasible, please apply according to what has been directed by several users here.
